wikipedia_page.main: David Milne   was a Scottish international rugby union player.He was capped once for Scotland in 1991. He also played for Heriot's Rugby Club.His brothers Iain and Kenny were also capped for Scotland.

response: * Sir David Milne (Royal Navy officer) (1763–1845), British admiral
* Sir David Milne (civil servant) (1896–1972), Permanent Under-Secretary of State for Scotland
* David Milne (rugby league) (born 1986), Australian rugby league player
* David Milne (rugby union), Scottish international rugby union player
* David Milne-Home (1805–1890), Scottish advocate and geologist, born David Milne (adopted the name Home upon marriage)
He is the brother of Iain, and David Milne.

David Milne is an Australian former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 2000s and 2010s.  Milne last played for the Mackay Cutters which is a feeder team for the North Queensland Cowboys. His usual position was as a Fullback.
* David Milne (rugby league), Australian Rugby League player
* David Milne (rugby union), former Scottish international rugby union player
